name: Space Crusaders 2.0
description:
You're a pilot, and you shoot aliens until you die or they reach the bottom of the screen. Just a small minigame.

This is a more polished, more advanced version of Space Crusaders that I created from the ground-up! All of the assets—including artwork, music, code, and sfx—belong to me, with the exception of some of the fonts and a few open-source scripts.

This was mainly a project made so that I could practice some new things and learn new skills, and I'm not completely content with it, but I saw it through nonetheless. Hope you enjoy!
